events.message: I received my order yesterday but the size was completely wrong. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a return request due to wrong size, classified under Refund cluster.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear the size was incorrect. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in original packaging for the return?
My order number is 879654321. Yes, the product has not been worn or damaged, and I have kept all the original tags and packaging intact.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return shipping label via email shortly. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please follow the instructions to ship the product back. We are here if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have shipped your return and remind you that refunds are processed within 5 business days of receipt.
I shipped the package yesterday and received confirmation from the courier. Thank you for following up!
We received your returned item and have processed the refund. You should see the amount reflected on your payment method shortly.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and gave a positive rating. Thanks again for the smooth refund process.
Closing the case as the refund was issued and customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution and support provided.
